Entities.name: Seat
Entities.script: (function () {   var seated = false;   var seater = 0;   this.clickDownOnEntity = function (entityID, mouseEvent) {   	var dist = Vec3.distance(MyAvatar.position, Entities.getEntityProperties(entityID).position);   	if (dist > 1) return;   	if (seated != MyAvatar.isSeated() || ((seated && MyAvatar.isSeated()) && seater != MyAvatar.sessionUUID)) return;     if (seated) {       Entities.editEntity(entityID, { color: { red: 255, green: 0, blue: 0 } });       MyAvatar.endSit(         Entities.localToWorldPosition(this.position, entityID),         Quat.cancelOutRoll(Quat.getFront(this.orientation))       );       seated = false;       seater = 0;     } else {       Entities.editEntity(entityID, { color: { red: 0, green: 255, blue: 0 } });       MyAvatar.beginSit(         Entities.localToWorldPosition(this.position, entityID),         Quat.cancelOutRoll(Quat.getFront(this.orientation))       );       seated = true;       seater = MyAvatar.sessionUUID;     }   }; });
